Title: Enacts the Fentanyl Fathers and Mothers Act
Summary: Requires the education department, in consultation with the department of health, to develop and adopt a comprehensive fentanyl education, awareness, and recognition program for all public, charter, and private schools in the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง804, add ยง804-e, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "Fentanyl Fathers and Mothers act"
